channel.title: Rickyrombo on rickyrombo

item.title: A Test Post
item.description:
Patience (Original Mix)[Free Download]

Patience (Original Mix)[Free Download]

by rickyrombo

Free download: https://rickyrombo.toneden.io/spotlight/patience-original-mix

Special thanks to Michael Hollman with all his immense help with this track, and everyone along the way who I forced to listen to it over and over.

I’ve been working on this one for almost a year now. It’s come a long way. It’s the first song where I tried to stay in a major key.

If you want a free download, leave a comment. If I get enough requests I might open it up.

This is the first song I feel remotely comfortable having my own vocals in, and that’s because autotune is a thing.

Here are the lyrics:

Another day by another week month and year

Got no reason yet I know just what I’d hear

Everyone has someone they want to save

But no one ever tries when they have the chance to save

They dream about becoming the hero

But they hide every day where are they now where are we now

Chorus — Waiting for that moment Waiting for the moment to shine Knowing one day Knowing one day you’ll be mine

Waiting for that moment Waiting for the moment to shine Knowing one day Knowing one day you’ll be mine Someday you’ll be mine

If you don’t love me I’ll find somebody new

Just let me know And I’ll give up on you

I won’t wait No I won’t wait for you

If you don’t love me now You won’t find out you do

The seasons pass of sun and snow

Good things come And good things go

We don’t have forever Where are they now Where are we now?

Chorus — Waiting for that moment Waiting for the moment to shine Knowing no way Knowing no way you’ll be mine

Waiting for that moment Waiting for the moment to shine Knowing no way Knowing no way you’ll be mine You’ll never be mine

You’ll never be mine x4

(I don’t care I don’t care I don’t care where they are now Where we are now)

Chorus — Waiting for that moment Waiting for the moment to shine Knowing one day Knowing one day I’ll be fine

Waiting for that moment Waiting for the moment to shine Knowing one day Knowing one day I’ll be fine Someday I’ll be fine

Patience
